HOW IT WORKS

At Flukes you book one-hour bursts at £10 per person / per hour, except pool which is £15 per hour for the table. We’re open Thursday to Sunday and available for private hire seven days a week.

Tap to flip

INTERACTIVE DARTS

Arrows, augmented! Digitally enhanced for your darting pleasure

players: Up to 10 players

price: £10 per person / per hour

space: We’ve got 6 dart boards

INTERACTIVE DARTS

At Flukes you’ll experience darts in out-of-this-world augmented reality. Just aim your throws where the dartboard glows. Anyone can win at this. That’s Flukes baby.

book now

INTERACTIVE SHUFFLE

Another classic, digitally remastered for max joy

players: Up to 8 players

price: £10 per person / per hour

space: We have 2 shuffleboards'

INTERACTIVE SHUFFLE

With enhanced gameplay from Shuffle Showdown (a UK first) you can forget about arguments over who’s winning. Our solid wood shuffleboards have three unique game modes that let you take your shuffle to the next level. And the next. And the next.

book now

karaoke

I wanna know what love izzzzz!!!!!

players: Either 8, 12 or 14 of you'

price: £10 per person / per hour

space: We’ve got 3 private rooms: Tina, Elton and Stevie

karaoke

Powered by those flukey folks at Lucky Voice – over 11,000 songs await you in the booths at Flukes. Duet-fiends: you’ll be pleased to find two mics in their holsters. Zigazigahh like no-one’s watching.

book now

POOL

Old school. No pixels. Just clickety-clack & blue chalk

players: Up to 8 players

price: £15 per table per hour

space: We’ve got 4 pool tables

POOL

Heard of it? Our tables are American-style ‘PureLine’ LA Pro, tournament grade slate beds upholstered in our house red cloth. The balls practically hover their way around out of sheer respect. Happy baize.

book now

parched?
peckish?

It’s fate. We’ve got you completely covered with moreish cocktails & mocktails, craft beers and wonderful wines, plus 48hr proved sourdough pizzas baked on-site, alongside all sorts of sharing plates & platters (GF, V, VG, OMG, ETC). See our full menu here.

Big Penny Social
Is Downstairs!

The home of Flukes – Big Penny Social – is full of laughter, dance, music, revelry, deliciousness and good times of pretty much every stripe. We’re the UK’s largest BEER HALL with a dizzying array of events and a huge sunny beer garden, so you’re in a great spot – before and after your Flukes sesh.
